src:
4000名跑步者参加Astra半程马拉松

04 Nov 2019, 02:38

在庆祝第6周年成立日，Astra Runners社团举办了以#InspiringMOVE为主题的Astra 半程马拉松活动。 Astra邀请跑步爱好者保护环境，即减少使用塑料. 来自印尼各地区的约4000名跑步者参加了此次Astra Half Marathon活动.图示：Astra 董事经理Suparno Djasmin（中）于周日在Astra Biz 中心 BSD City开设了Astra 半程马拉松活动时的情景.
text:
4,000 runners participate in the Astra Half Marathon

04 Nov 2019, 02:38

On the 6th anniversary of the celebration, the Astra Runners Society hosted the Astra Half Marathon with the theme #InspiringMOVE. Astra invites runners to protect the environment by reducing the use of plastic. About 4,000 runners from various regions of Indonesia participated in the Astra Half Marathon event. Photo: Astra Managing Director Suparno Djasmin (middle) at Astra Biz Center on Sunday BSD City opened the Astra half marathon.
